Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are immediately followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are followed (at any point in the trace) by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur after SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Ratio of SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Declined within the same case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Percentage of cases containing SW-AE Assign Reviewers that also contain at least one Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in traces where SW-Reviewer No Response occurs
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are not followed by any reviewer response (i.e., no SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer Unavailable afterward)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Average number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers executions per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers appearing more than once in the same variant
Metric: the sum of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that directly precede SW-Reviewer Declined compared to those that directly precede SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Ratio of SW-AE Assign Reviewers to total reviewer-related activities (including SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer Unavailable, SW-Reviewer No Response) per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurring after a deadline reminder (e.g., SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days or SW-Reviewer Selection is now due)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in the first round of review versus in subsequent rounds (identified by presence of Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation beforehand)
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing SW-AE Assign Reviewers that result in a final decision (SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, etc.) within 60 days
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Fraction of SW-AE Assign Reviewers executions that are part of loops involving repeated reviewer assignment attempts without eventual agreement
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` != 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur in the context of a major revision cycle (i.e., after SW–Major Revision due in X days activities)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['SW–Major Revision due in 3 days', 'SW–Major Revision due in 1 week', 'SW–Major Revision due in 2 weeks', 'SW–Major Revision due in 1 month', 'SW–Major Revision due in 3 weeks']"}"
